sentences.sentence: I put his pix in my new book ChineseGentleman and he is a real gentleman.
sentences.translation: 我将他的照片放在了《中国绅士》这本新书中，他就是一名真正的绅士。

sentences.sentence: Thanks for the amazing support and inspiring stories - will post pix soon!
sentences.translation: 谢谢所有让人惊喜不已的支持与鼓舞人心的故事-我会很快贴上照片的！

sentences.sentence: "I am completely stunned by these pix," wrote Ginny Potter on fan site danradcliffe.co.uk.
sentences.translation: 基尼·特在“哈迷”网站(danradcliffe . co . uk)上说：“看到那些照片时，我简直都懵了！”
